languages.text: "Исключительно нашим с вами долгом перед Человечеством. Именно он требует от меня вновь нарушить ваш покой".

traits.locale_text: "Исключительно нашим с вами долгом перед Человечеством. Именно он требует от меня вновь нарушить ваш покой."

languages.text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."
languages.original_text: "Исключительно нашим с вами долгом перед Человечеством. Именно он требует от меня вновь нарушить ваш покой".

traits.locale_text: "Only to our mutual duty to humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."
"Only to our mutual duty to humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."
"Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."
"Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."
"Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

languages.text: 「人類に対する我らの共通の義務を満たすため。再びあなたの平和を乱すことになるが、それが義務というもの」
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: 「人類に対する我らの共通の義務を満たすため。再びあなたの平和を乱すことになるが、それが義務というもの」

languages.text: “只是为了我们对人类的共同职责。出于这样的职责，我不得不再次打扰你的安宁。”
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: “只是为了我们对人类的共同职责。出于这样的职责，我不得不再次打扰你的安宁。”

languages.text: «Solo a nuestro deber mutuo para con la Humanidad. Ese deber mismo me exige que quebrante su paz una vez más».
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: «Solo a nuestro deber mutuo para con la Humanidad. Ese deber mismo me exige que quebrante su paz una vez más».

languages.text: « Notre devoir mutuel envers l'humanité, tout simplement. C'est lui qui m'oblige à nouveau à perturber votre tranquillité. »
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: « Notre devoir mutuel envers l'humanité, tout simplement. C'est lui qui m'oblige à nouveau à perturber votre tranquillité. »

languages.text: "Nur unserer gemeinsamen Pflicht gegenüber der Menschheit. Und diese Pflicht verlangt, dass ich Euren Frieden ein weiteres Mal störe."
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: "Nur unserer gemeinsamen Pflicht gegenüber der Menschheit. Und diese Pflicht verlangt, dass ich Euren Frieden ein weiteres Mal störe."

languages.text: "İnsanlığa olan ortak vazifemize tabii. Bu vazife nedeniyle huzurunu bir kez daha bozmak durumundayım."
languages.original_text: "Only to our mutual duty to Humanity. It is that duty that demands that I disturb your peace once more."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığa olan ortak görevimize tabii. Bu görev nedeniyle huzurunuzu bir kez daha bozmak durumundayım."
